Question
========

Suppose the number of games soccer players participate in during their careers is normally distributed with a mean of 1500 games and a standard deviation of 350. Then what is the percentage of players who played fewer than 750 games?

Answerlist
----------

* 1,61%
* 50%
* 23%
* 76%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1,61%: Correct
* 50%: Incorrect
* 23%: Incorrect
* 76%: Incorrect
